backend/main.mo: Defines core Motoko types and comparison utilities for subjects, chapters, questions, user stats, and includes storage mixins for persistent backend state.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature changes to affected frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of key frontend files across hooks, pages, types, and layout components.
frontend/docs/ARCHITECTURE.md: Highâ€‘level overview of the frontend architecture, tech stack, and directory structure for the LearningXHub React application.
frontend/docs/release-verification-v18-r: Detailed checklist for verifying behavior after rolling back to Version 18, covering routes, UI behavior, and contributor access flow.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base configuration defining light/dark theme variables and global style tokens for the frontend.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, loading external scripts, and mounting the React root element.
frontend/index.ts: Type definition file describing the shape of a user stats object with bigint fields.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router configuration, route tree, authentication checks, and global layout for the React app.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGateC: File present but content not provided, presumably the admin password gate UI component.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth flow and showing loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Form card for creating a user profile by submitting a name via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/contributor/Cani: Displays a timeout warning with retry, reload, and home navigation options when canister connection is slow.
frontend/src/components/contributor/Cont: Password gate for contributor access, validating login, actor readiness, and submitting password.
frontend/src/components/contributor/PdfI: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/errors/GlobalErr: React error boundary that catches errors and renders a global error screen.
Full-page UI displaying error details with options to reload or return home.
Main application layout with header, navigation, mobile drawer, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobilePag: Wrapper component applying responsive max-width and padding for mobile-friendly pages.
frontend/src/components/practice/Questio: Renders numbered navigation buttons for questions, highlighting current and answered ones.
frontend/src/components/practice/YearSel: Dialog for selecting an exam year and confirming to start practice.
frontend/src/config/liveDeployment.ts: Defines live deployment name and provides validation utilities for checking naming rules.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Provides hooks to check contributor access and validate contributor passwords, invalidating related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider managing login, logout, stored identities, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/usePracticeTimer.ts: Implements a simple timer hook with start, stop, reset, and elapsed time in ms, seconds, and microseconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for user profiles, admin checks, chapters, and CRUD operations, all backed by the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers with custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Empty page placeholder for admin functionality.
frontend/src/pages/ChapterCategorySelect: Displays category options for a chapter and navigates to practice flows, including year selection for PYQ categories.
frontend/src/pages/ChapterSelectPage.tsx: Lists chapters for a subject and navigates to category selection, showing loading or empty states as needed.
frontend/src/pages/ContributorPage.tsx: Contributor interface for managing chapters and questions, with access control and admin tools.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page offering navigation to student mode, rankings, and contributor mode with actor readiness checks.
frontend/src/pages/PracticePage.tsx: Loads and presents practice questions by chapter/category, manages progress, timer, and answer submission.
frontend/src/pages/RankingsPage.tsx: Displays overall and subject leaderboards with rank icons and highlights for the current user.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsPage.tsx: Shows detailed results of a completed practice session, including accuracy, timing, and question review.
frontend/src/pages/SubjectSelectPage.tsx: Subject selection screen allowing navigation to chapter lists for each subject.
frontend/src/types/practice.ts: Type definitions for practice sessions, attempts, and per-question answer persistence.
frontend/src/utils/pdf/pdfSolutionMappin: Placeholder for PDF solution-to-question mapping utilities.
frontend/src/utils/pdf/pdfTextReconstruc: Placeholder for PDF text reconstruction utilities.
frontend/src/utils/pdf/pdfToQuestions.ts: Placeholder for extracting questions from PDFs.
frontend/src/utils/practiceProgressStora: Provides localStorage utilities to save, load, and clear anonymous user practice progress using composite keys.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from URL/hash for routing flows.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current issues, feature requests, and required fixes for student flow and contributor UI.
